backend/main.mo: Defines workspace, subscription, sales, marketing, and portfolio types plus comparison utilities and an authorizationâ€‘gated function for generating AI ads.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptive summaries for numerous frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color tokens and theming variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point with root element and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication gating, and all top-level routes including subscription analytics.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their business name and create a profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/Authentic: Layout wrapper with sidebar navigation and main content container for authenticated pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNa: Renders a sidebar with navigation links, user info, and a login button, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/portfolios/Portf: Form for creating or editing a portfolio, including optional impact portfolio fields and validation.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Su: Displays a subscription status using a styled badge with variants based on status type.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Wo: Provides search and filter buttons to filter workspace subscription data by status or plan.
Renders a table of workspace subscription details with formatted dates, plan labels, and status badges.
frontend/src/components/system/QueryStat: Provides loading, error, and empty state UI components for handling query states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating business workspace data, including profile updates, portfolio updates, and AI ad generation.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout.
frontend/src/lib/adGeneration.ts: Generates ad copy variations using tone templates, channel endings, and randomized benefit statements.
frontend/src/lib/subscription.ts: Computes subscription status including label, expiration, days remaining, and cancelability.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdGeneratorPage.tsx: UI for generating and saving AI ad variations, gated by subscription status and workspace data.
frontend/src/pages/CampaignDetailPage.ts: Displays details of a specific marketing campaign and its advertisements from the workspace.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows workspace overview including subscription status and counts for portfolios, sales, and campaigns.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login screen using Internet Identity with a button to trigger authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingPage.tsx: Fetches and displays marketing campaigns, handling loading, errors, empty state, and listing campaigns with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioDetailPage.t: Shows details for a single portfolio with edit support, loading/error states, and update handling.
frontend/src/pages/PortfoliosPage.tsx: Lists all portfolios with create and delete actions, including empty state handling and a form for new portfolios.
frontend/src/pages/SalesPage.tsx: Displays sales items with filtering by status, showing a table of results or empty state when no items exist.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionAnalytics: Loads subscription analytics, supports search and filtering, and handles admin access checks and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Renders the subscription management page, showing current subscription status and actions to start trials, activate plans, or cancel. Uses workspace queries and mutation hooks to update plans.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from URL hashes. Supports both query-string and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and layout settings. Enables plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, new feature requests, and project configuration for subscription analytics expansion.
